meanings.definition: Extending far down from the top or surface.
meanings.sent1: The well was very deep, reaching down to the bottom.
meanings.sent2: The ocean is deep, with many creatures living in its depths.
meanings.sent3: The hole was so deep that even a ladder couldn't reach the bottom.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was as deep as the ocean, never-ending and vast.
meanings.sent5: The darkness in the cave was so deep, it felt like a never-ending night.

meanings.definition: Extending far from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The wide river was deep, flowing from bank to bank.
meanings.sent2: The forest was deep, with trees stretching out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The pizza was so deep with toppings, it was like a mountain of flavors.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was deep, resonating through the room like a powerful melody.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset were so deep, painting the sky in shades of orange and pink.

meanings.definition: Extending far back from the front or from an edge.
meanings.sent1: The cave was deep, leading into the darkness beyond.
meanings.sent2: The closet was deep, with clothes hanging far back out of reach.
meanings.sent3: The pie was so deep with filling, it seemed to overflow with sweetness.
meanings.sent4: His thoughts were deep, delving into the mysteries of the universe.
meanings.sent5: The canyon was so deep, it felt like a journey into the heart of the earth.
